original_text: So Joram went over to Zair, and all the chariots with him: and he rose by night, and smote the Edomites which compassed him about, and the captains of the chariots: and the people fled into their tents.
korean_text: 여호람이 모든 병거를 거느리고 사일로 갔더니 밤에 일어나 자기를 에워싼 에돔 사람과 그 병거의 장관들을 치니 이에 백성이 도망하여 각각 그들의 장막들로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: So Joram went over to Zair
and all the chariots with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 모든 병거들도 함께 갔으며

sentences.original_text: and smote the Edomites which compassed him about
and the captains of the chariots
and the people fled into their tents
